Script.name: Start alt timer
Script.script:
function alt_timer:sys_disconnection() cecho("<green>Starting timer for alting.
") cecho("<green>Date - Time: " ..getTime(true, "yyyy.MM.dd - HH:mm:ss") .. "
") self.sameside_timer = tempTimer(301, function() cecho("<green>You may log on a sameside alt now!
") end) self.crossrace_timer = tempTimer(901, function() cecho("<green>You may log on a crossrace alt now!
") end) end
registerAnonymousEventHandler("sysDisconnectionEvent", "alt_timer:sys_disconnection")

Script.name: End alt timer
Script.script:
function alt_timer:sys_connection() if self.sameside_timer then killTimer(self.sameside_timer) end if self.crossrace_timer then killTimer(self.crossrace_timer) end end
registerAnonymousEventHandler("sysConnectionEvent", "alt_timer:sys_connection")
